About the Company: Thakral Services (India) Ltd is a 100% owned subsidiary of Thakral Group system integrator partner of IBM & an authorized partner for Compaq, equipped to market their entire range of PC products and services. An authorized partner for Cisco and have national tie-ups with other principals and distributors for peripherals, networking components & software products.The product range of the company includes For Video Surveillance-Cameras-Box Cameras,Dome Cameras and IR Cameras.DVRs-Standalone DVRs and PC Based DVRs.Accessories-Lens,Power Supply,Cable,Connector,Audio and Keyboard.
